channel.title: How does hamachi work?
channel.description:
I ahve hamachi, I know how to go in a server, but when im in, what does it help me for joining the server? Most of the time nothing.. How can I let it work?
ty, ownage

item.title: How does hamachi work?
item.dc:creator: @0wnage_0wner 0wnage 0wner
item.description:
@0wnage_0wner wrote:

So if I want to join a ms server with hamachi I only need to go into the ham server and then join game?

Read full topic

Join a network, and play…

item.title: How does hamachi work?
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

[quote=“0wnage 0wner, post:1, topic:82388”]I ahve hamachi, I know how to go in a server, but when im in, what does it help me for joining the server? Most of the time nothing… How can I let it work?

ty, ownage[/quote]

To ‘let it work’ just find the little icon which is just like a triangle with circles at each point, click on it and click ‘join network’
Then just fill the details (get hamachi details on the advertisement posts)
To make a ham server, just click on the same one but click create a network
Do whatever then when you advertise type the ip on top of your hamachi window (starts with 5)
with the network name (case sensitive) and pass

Read full topic
